markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kitsune Spell Mysteries](/Feats.aspx?ID=2624) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat

</column>

---

You know more kitsune magic. During your daily preparations, choose [_bane_](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160), or [_sanctuary_](/Spells.aspx?ID=266). You can cast this as a 1st-level divine innate spell once that day.

<title level="2">Kitsune Spell Mysteries leads to...</title>
[Kitsune Spell Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2629)
name: Kitsune Spell Mysteries
prerequisite: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
prerequisite_markdown: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
